successes.title: Ava's Demon: Book Two
successes.description: Ava's Demon is a webcomic about Ava and the demon haunting her. Help me continue her adventure by funding its second book!

Pledges.description: My undying gratitude for your support in Ava's Demon!
DIGITAL PACT - A high-resolution PDF of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety. HD 1080p downloads of the chapter animations, and A digital THANK YOU card for your support in Ava's Demon!
PIN PACT - A set of 4 new collectible pins. Comes with stickers, a random card, high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety, and animation downloads.
SPEED PACT BOOK ONE - Book One with no add-ons to ensure you receive the book quickly. With this you will also get high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.
SPEED PACT BOOK TWO - Book Two with no add-ons to ensure you receive the book quickly. With this you will also get high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

BOOK ONE - The Ava's Demon Book One, 9''x9'' hardcover book in all its glory. Comes with stickers and a set of 6 cards. With this you will also get high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

BOOK TWO - The Ava's Demon Book Two, 9''x9'' hardcover book in all its glory.  Comes with stickers and a set of 6 cards.  With this you will also get high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

BOOK ONE - SIGNED - The Ava's Demon Book One, 9''x9'' hardcover book in all its glory SIGNED by the author. Comes with set of 6 cards and stickers. With this you will also get high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

BOOK TWO - SIGNED - The Ava's Demon Book Two, 9''x9'' hardcover book in all its glory SIGNED by the author. Comes with set of 6 cards and stickers. With this you will also get high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.
ONLY THE BRONZE KEY - Ava's bronze key necklace in a satin bag. With this you will also get  high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

SPEED PACT BOOKS 1 + 2 - Books One and Two with no add-ons to ensure you receive the book quickly. With this you will also get high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

BOOK TWO - PIN PACT - SIGNED Ava's Demon Book Two, 9''x9'' hardcover book in all its glory and a set of 4 collectible pins. With this you will also get a set of 6 cards, stickers, high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.
ONLY MAGNOLIA'S  NECKLACE - Maggie's pendant on a silver necklace in a satin bag. With this you will also get high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

BOOKS ONE AND TWO - The Ava's Demon Books One and Two, 9''x9'' hardcover books in all their glory.Comes with a set of 6 cards and stickers. With this you will also get high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

BOOKS ONE AND TWO - SIGNED - The Ava's Demon Books One and Two, 9''x9'' hardcover books in all their glory, signed by the author. Comes with a set of 6 cards and stickers. With this you will also get high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

BOOKS ONE AND TWO PIN PACT - The Ava's Demon Books One and Two, 9''x9'' hardcover books in all their glory.Comes with 4 pins a set of 6 cards and stickers. With this you will also get high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

BOOK ONE AND BRONZE KEY -
Comes with Ava's Demon Book One signed by the author, a bronze-plated, to-scale replica of Ava's Key on a wearable necklace presented to you in a red satin bag. With this you will also get a set of 6 cards, stickers, high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

BOOK TWO AND MAGGIE'S NECKLACE - 
Comes with Ava's Demon Book Two signed by the author, Maggie's pendant and necklace in a satin bag. With this you will also get a set of 6 cards, stickers, high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

With this you will also get a set of 6 cards, stickers, high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

DUAL NECKLACE PACT - 
Come with a bronze-plated, to-scale replica of Ava's Key on a wearable necklace presented to you in a red satin bag. Maggie's pendant on a silver necklace in a satin bag. With this you will also get high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

With this you will also get high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

A set of 4 pins and a set of 6 cards.With this you will also get high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

BOOKS ONE AND TWO AND BRONZE KEY
Comes with Ava's Demon Book Two signed by the author, , a bronze-plated, to-scale replica of Ava's Key on a wearable necklace presented to you in a red satin bag.With this you will also get a set of 6 cards, stickers, high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

BOOKS ONE AND TWO NECKLACE AND PIN PACT - SIGNED - The Ava's Demon Books One and Two, 9''x9'' hardcover books in all their glory, signed by the author. Comes with 4 pins, a set of 6 cards and stickers.  A bronze-plated, to-scale replica of Ava's Key on a wearable necklace presented to you in a red satin bag. Maggie's pendant and necklace in a satin bag. With this you will also get high-resolution PDFs of the books 1 and 2 in their entirety and animation downloads.

BOOK ONE "PACT MAKER"- SIGNED by the author with the "OFFICIAL PACT MAKER" seal on the back cover, A bronze-plated, to-scale replica of Ava's Key on a wearable necklace presented to you in a red satin bag, PDFs of book one and two, animation downloads, random prints, a set of buttons, set of 4 pins and a set of 6 cards.

BOOK TWO "PACT MAKER" - SIGNED by the author with the "OFFICIAL PACT MAKER" seal on the back cover, A replica of Maggie's Necklace presented to you in a satin bag, PDFs of book one and two, animation downloads, random prints, a set of buttons, a set of 4 pins and a set of 6 cards.

BOOK TWO "PACT MAKER" - SIGNED PINPACT by the author with the "OFFICIAL PACT MAKER" seal on the back covers, Maggie's Necklace and Ava's Key presented to you in a satin bag, PDFs of book one and two, animation downloads, random prints, a set of buttons, a set of 4 pins, a set of 6 cards, and an ink sketch of a character of your choice.

BOOKS ONE + TWO "PACT MAKER" - SIGNED by the author with the "OFFICIAL PACT MAKER" seal on the back covers, Maggie's Necklace and Ava's Key presented to you in a satin bag, PDFs of book one and two, animation downloads, random prints, a set of buttons, a set of 4 pins, a set of 6 cards, and an ink sketch of a character of your choice.

THE DEMON PACT - Digital portrait of a demon specially designed for you in the Ava's Demon Universe, added to a portrait of yourself - printed for you and signed, as well as a download to the high resolution digital copy. Plus everything included in the previous tier.
An animation, by the author and artist, of you and your demon making a pact, animated to music of your choice, plus everything in THE DEMON PACT tier.
Your ship will be canon in a single panel. I will print out that panel and hang it on the bathroom wall.
